description: A square array based on tetrahedral numbers (A000292) with each term being the sum of 2 consecutive terms in the previous row.
formula: T(n, k)=T(n-1, k-1)+T(n, k-1) with T(0, k)=1, T(4, 1)=4, T(0, 2n)=T(4, n) and T(0, 2n+1)=0. Coefficient of x^n in expansion of (1+x)^k/(1-x^2)^4.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Nov 20 2000
